blog.name: filiasyth
blog.title: talk to me about video james
blog.description:
Filia ~ 22 ~ she/they ~ Hopelessly obsessed with art, comics, writing, Owl City, McElroys, gaming, Deaf culture, and social justice.  I play Elder Scrolls (Oblivion, Skyrim, ESO), the Dishonored franchise, the Mirror's Edge franchise, Assassin's Creed (Odyssey, Black Flag), Bioshock Infinite, Fallout 4, and Prey. ~
 ART BLOG:  filiasart.tumblr.com

title: NEW OC with info
body:
Was tagged by the most awesome of awesome CHP @djfatchip to share some info on an oc. This is a new oc that has been taking shape in my head ever since Cyberpunk 2077 was announced. Her name is Verina Deztina Sophia Cruz or “V.” I’ve been on the hunt for someone for me to commission in order to bring her to life. I know this game won’t be out anytime soon, but I’m just excited to have an oc already taking shape. 

BASICS:

  • Full Name: Verina Deztina Sophia Cruz aka “V” or “Dez”
  • Gender: Female
  • Sexuality: Straight
  • Pronouns: She/her

OTHER:

  • Family: Parents (idk at the moment) but before she moved to Night City. she was married, had a son named Noah, and for a good while; lived a quiet life. She and her small family where, unfortunately, part of an accident that took the life of her five year old. She and her husband survived. He suffered a broken arm and leg but “V” required special cybernetics on both her legs to help her walk. The recovery, however, was not, and would not, be over soon. At the time, her husband was the strongest. He supported her, cared for her, helped her, tried to make her smile with sweet memories of their Noah; but she could not be reached. Her broken heart was too much; and she knew. So, she let him go. It would be better for him to recover without her. Now divorced, she lives in Night City and just like the other dark dwellers, she endures. She’s not at her best but she’s slowly crawling out of her worst.
  • Birthplace: I do not know
  • Job: “Techie”
  • Fears: tires screeching, getting close to people, losing people . 
  • Guilty Pleasures: hoarding different types of tech and leaving it all over her apartment and Jackie’s place.
  • Hobbies: playing acoustic guitar, reading, hanging with Jackie

MORALS:

  • Alignment: Chaotic Good
  • Sins: Drinking  
  • Virtues: Honest, Loyal, Accepting, Assertive, Creative, Fair, Diligent, Patient, Reliable, Sincere, Tactful, Steadfast     

THIS OR THAT:

  • Introvert/extrovert
  • Organized/disorganized
  • Close-minded/open-minded
  • Calm/anxious/restless
  • Disagreeable/agreeable/in-between
  • Cautious/reckless/in-between
  • Patient/impatient
  • Outspoken/reserved
  • Leader/follower/flexible
  • Empathetic/unempathetic
  • Optimistic/pessimistic/realistic
  • Traditional/modern/in-between
  • Hardworking/lazy

RELATIONSHIPS:

  • OTP: Don’t know yet
  • BROTP: V and Jackie
  • NOTP: Don’t know yet

summary: CD Projekt RED: Мы хотели бы показать игровой индустрии как нужно работать
title: CD Projekt RED: Мы хотели бы показать игровой индустрии как нужно работать
body: Совсем недавно студия CD Projekt RED рассказала о том, что Cyberpunk 2077 не будет избегать обсуждения политических проблем. И в разговоре с изданием EDGE дизайнер квестов Патрик Миллс слегка перефразировал это утверждение. Он рассказал, что CD Proje… Читать дальше »

summary: RE: the dumb fuck complaining about diversity on the Cyberpunk forums, I'm honestly getting my fucking life knowing all these...
question: RE: the dumb fuck complaining about diversity on the Cyberpunk forums, I'm honestly getting my fucking life knowing all these fanboys who latched on to CDPR as the last bastion of Tru Gamerz who would never Pander™️ to those nasty women and gayz are now watching CDPR market Cyberpunk 2077 with the female lead, openly advertise and show off the main (male) character having queer relationships put PoC everywhere. They must feel so fucking betrayed and their impotent nerd rage delights me :)
answer: same fam

reblog.comment: same fam

trail.content_raw: same fam
